about.description: Design engineer specialized in design systems and accessibility, I create intuitive interfaces combining aesthetics and inclusivity.

reviews.review1: It's especially his ability to adapt to any type of project that is impressive. I have very good memories of our collaboration and I highly recommend him!
reviews.review2: An incredible experience, very satisfied with the results!

esmicom.name: Esmicom E-learning
esmicom.description: E-learning platform allowing students to follow their university courses, teachers to monitor their students' progress, and administrators to manage everything.

2025.title: Freelance
2025.description: Early 2025: consolidation of my technical and soft skills, launch of my freelance activity.
achievements: Strengthening project management skills through various trainings.
Technical lead on two major projects, from concept to deployment.
Active contributions to important open-source projects.

2024.title: Growth and Innovation
2024.description: 2024: deepening modern web technologies and developing high-value projects.
achievements: Development of custom applications for a private company.
Collaboration with a multidisciplinary team to deploy new features.
Continuous improvement in UX/UI to optimize user experience.

2023.title: Acquisition of Fundamentals
2023.description: 2023: intensive learning of web development basics and exploration of main frameworks.
achievements: Mastery of JavaScript, HTML and CSS fundamentals and ReactJs.
Completion of several personal projects to apply knowledge.
Introduction to front-end frameworks like React.

2021-2022.title: Discovery of Development
2021-2022.description: 2021-2022: first steps in the world of software development and programming.
achievements: Discovery of JavaScript and creation of simple scripts.

2015-2019.title: Electronics and Radio Transmission Engineer
2015-2019.description: Specialized training in electronic systems and radio transmission, combining theory and practice.
achievements: Mastery of analog and digital electronics.
Design and implementation of electronic circuits.

hero.title: Web and mobile developer, radio transmission engineer and electrician,
hero.description1: I design and maintain web and mobile applications,
hero.description2: motivated by stimulating projects that allow exploring and exploiting innovative technologies.
